revisionDesc.change: Change date range to only include Saturdays in April, 4-06 to 04-27 rather than 04-01 to 04-30.
Duke proofreading corrections and minor note corrections.
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
checked; moved notes to external file and replaced with ptrs in this file
Moved RMBucke to HandNote; fixed editor, date, and title; reviewed paragraphing
Replaced smart quotes with straight; removed external URL links; added Bucke
Completed proofreading corrections, annotated Jeff's travel for St. Louis position and unknown Times review.

body.p:
i have just receeved received your letter with 1 dollar in it the rain perhaps deterd deterred my getting it earlyer earlier but i was glad to get it any how glad to hear from you that you are having time to take some recreations and very glad to have the dollar you will say a dollar aint ain't much but sometimes it is worth more than 2 or 3 at another time george has had more than usual to pay this month in sessments assessments and insurance but i have had quite considerable from him so i wanted a letter to day and it come from the good old stand by) Jeffy worried quite much because he couldent couldn't leave me something in the way of a present but he said he had to pay so much more away than he expected that he was rather short but he would send me some when he got back i told him i got along very well to not worry about that he went away tuesday Tuesday
night he is not going strait straight home but will arrive home if nothing happens on monday Monday night we had company almost all of last week which made me more short of funds but i dident didn't want for anything) george has got the galaxy Galaxy just come with it walt i suppose you see that little peice piece in the thursday Thursday times about your being the only american poet i cut it out and was going to send it to jeff if you havent haven't seen it i will send it to you georgey is quit pumping on the water works mr Lane puts great confidence in him the new mane main that was laid last fall leaks in many places george had to go the other night to see about it mr lane came here very much alarmed it spouts out almost lik like a fountain so yesterday they stopped it george was mud from head to foot) walter dear give my love to mr and mrs OconerO'Connor likewise the boroughs Burroughs and take the rest for yourself

postscript.p: aint ain't the galaxy large and reel real nice
